ygData.subject: Opal Darkbriar
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I dont want to say too much (pretty big spoiler from a story line perspective at least), although you ll have to get in good with the Bunker to work the
ygData.messageBody:
>Message: 6
> Date: Mon, 17 May 1999 09:59:12 -0500
> From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>
>Subject: Re: Lydl The Great quest item
>
>anyone notice that there are 2 opal darkbriars in freeport? one in the
>necro guild and one in the wizard guild. kinda akes ya wonder if it's
>another double name in EQ (there are lots) or if there's a story behind it
>(ie she's both a wiz and a necro)...
>
>Qorona of the Volition Guild, 18th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule
>
I dont want to say too much (pretty big spoiler from a story line
perspective at least), although you'll have to get in good with the Bunker
to work the quest, but there most certainly IS a reason both the necro and
wizard guildmasters are named Opal Darkbriar. Chew on that one for a while.
=)

Cheers,
Jude Morrigan
